headline: Jim Cramer on CSX: “This Is a Company That’s Going to Do a Lot of Self-Help”
summary: CSX Corporation (NASDAQ:CSX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed, along with market shortages. Cramer mentioned the company during the episode and commented: When CSX got rid of Hinrichs, they brought in this guy that we really like, a terrific replacement. His name is Steve Angel… He’s a great operator, but you know, not […]
